name: brintclab
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, cint(cab(s0, w0)), c1), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cv(s0)))))

stmt.origin: bitri(wbr(c0, cint(cab(s0, w0)), c1), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cv(s0)))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), cint(cab(s0, w0))))

|- wb(wbr(c0, cint(cab(s0, w0)), c1), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), cv(s0)))))

|- diffsc(s0, cop(c0, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Two ways to express a binary relation which is the intersection of a class. (Contributed by RP, 4-Apr-2020.)
